subject: Thread + junit
msgSnippet: Hi team, I am facing the problem while writing test case which includes run method.,While i am going with a IDE it works fine, But ruuning from the command
messageBody:
Hi team,

I am facing the problem while writing test case which includes run
method.,While i am going with a IDE it works fine, But ruuning from
the command line i am not getting the respective lines geeting
covered, i assume since ant has its own JVM thread i was unable to
quit and proceed with mines , How can i proceed my test case to cover
it up.

any suggestions is highly appreciated.

Thx
Karthik
